message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
Alice, my turn. Let's be realistic. This is a good offer considering the time pressure.
Bob, this is a better deal than your last.  We're running out of time, let's be reasonable.
Alice, time is ticking and the value is decreasing. This is a fair deal considering the circumstances. Let's close this deal.
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but this is getting ridiculous. Take this offer before the money shrinks even further for you!
Alice, I understand your position, but I need a larger share to make this worthwhile with the inflation.  This is my final offer.
Bob, I'm compromising again.  This is a very fair offer considering the rapidly shrinking pot for you. Don't let greed make you lose out!
